keywords: Gynecologist, Obstetrician, Gynecologist Raanana, Gynecologist Netanya, Dr. Claude Allouche, Dr. Claude Allouche Raanana, Dr. Claude Allouche Netanya, Dr. Claude Allouche Gynecologist, Dr. Claude Allouche Obstetrician, Dr. Claude Allouche Raanana, Dr. Claude Allouche Netanya
title: Dr. Claude Allouche - Gynecologist
name: Dr. Claude Allouche
mainDescription: As a specialist in gynecology and obstetrics, I support you with professionalism and care at every stage of your life as a woman.

about.first: I am Dr. Claude Allouche, a gynecologist-obstetrician in Raanana and Netanya, with many years of experience and a remarkable background in various fields of my specialty.
about.second: With French training, after studying medicine in Paris and completing my obstetrics and gynecology residency in Caen, I worked for over 25 years as a hospital practitioner at the Évreux hospital in Normandy, where I headed the Women's-Mother-Children's division of the Évreux and Vernon hospitals.
about.last: After making aliyah at the end of 2018, I now work as a gynecologist-obstetrician in Israel at the Laniado Hospital, at the Clalit Health Fund in Netanya, and in my private practice at the Ahuza Clinic in Raanana. In my Raanana clinic, a range of services is offered, including.
about.plus: Gynecological follow-up with IUD placement, contraception monitoring, smear tests, and gynecological ultrasounds. Pregnancy follow-up, obstetric ultrasounds, and care for pregnant women.
about.tab1: Gynecological follow-up with IUD placement, contraception monitoring, smear tests, and gynecological ultrasounds.
about.tab2: Pregnancy follow-up, obstetric ultrasounds, and care for pregnant women.

clinic.title: Ahuza Clinic in
clinic.description: At my Ahuza Clinic in Ra'anana, I support my patients with flexibility and patience, personal attention, and great availability throughout the three stages of a woman's life:

tabs1.title: Before pregnancy
tabs1.description: To ensure gynecological follow-up, perform smear tests, and establish personalized contraception tailored to each of you.

tabs2.title: During pregnancy
tabs2.description: Where the follow-up will also be personalized with clear explanations in French about the different stages we will go through together over the next 9 months.

tabs3.title: And menopause
tabs3.description: A pivotal period in a woman's life, during which you need to be supported more than ever with expert advice and sometimes medical treatments.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.message: Hello Dr. Claude Allouche, I would like to make an appointment.
whatsapp.description: Do you have questions or want to make an appointment? Contact me via WhatsApp.
